long_description:
Adds more life to the caves of your world

This mod modifies the existing caves of Minetest Game and adds 5 types of new cave styles, including roots on cave ceilings in forest areas, ice caves in cold areas, mushroom caves, dripstone caves and bacteria caves in deep layers.

It also adds some recipes and crafting stuff like doors, walls and stairs.
name: livingcaves
short_description: Adds more life to the caves of your world
title: Livingcaves
